sysevent_email_action.description: when approval generated in form 1 out of scope
sysevent_email_action.message_html:
Kia ora ${approver},


Thank you for completing Form 1, for the service below:

BS11 Assessment ${URI_REF}


The information collected indicates that the service meets the criteria to be out of scope for BS11. If you choose to approve the assessment, your approval confirms the items set out below for your role for this service.

Once approved, the Business Contact and Operational Risk and Compliance team member will ensure that the assessment conclusion is entered into the BS11 Sharepoint within 15 days of approval.


BU Contact or BU Owner

The Business Contact and Owner are responsible for the risks associated with the services they outsource, including compliance with the BS11 Outsourcing Policy as required by Kiwibank’s conditions of registration as a bank.


If you are the BU Contact approval confirms:

1. The information in the BS11 Assessment is correct and clearly describes the service.

2. I have consulted my Operational Risk and Compliance team as necessary, in reaching the conclusion that the service is out of scope for BS11.


If you are the BU Owner, approval confirms:

1. I have reviewed the BS11 Assessment in ServiceNow and discussed the arrangement as necessary.

2. The Assessment shows that the function or service is not within the scope of BS11, and this assessment seems reasonable.


If you are the Operational Risk and Compliance team member

The Operational Risk and Compliance team advise the Business Contact and Owner. Your approval confirms:

1. I have reviewed the BS11 Assessment in ServiceNow, and discussed the arrangement as necessary.

2. The information shows that the function or service appears on the Exempt List or Not Outsourcing list and is not directly relevant to an Outcome.

3. The Assessment seems reasonable and is clearly describes the service so that it can be understood by anyone.

4. I will ensure that the the assessment conclusion is entered into the BS11 Sharepoint within 15 days of approval.
